title: Tilapia with Peanut Crust with Yummi Nuts Peanut with Lemon
ingredients: ½ cup chopped Yummi Nuts with Lemon
instructions: Step 1: Heat the oil in a skillet over medium high heat.
Step 2: Fry the leek and ginger until golden brown. Remove from heat and drain on butler paper, reserve the pan and oil.
Step 3: Place the flour, egg, and ground peanuts in different deep bowls.
Step 4: Season the tilapia fillets with salt and pepper. Cover them with flour, then with egg, and finally with the chopped peanuts.
Step 5: Fry the steaks in the same skillet for 4 minutes on each side over medium high heat.
Step 6: Serve the steaks on a plate, add the leek and ginger, and drizzle the vinegar over the top.
